Title: Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse Recap - Climax Chokuzen Special
Description: ["A recap primarily of episodes 3-19, this special aired prior to episode 20.  It also included the new OP/ED of the series and a preview of what's to come in future episodes."]
